title: Pretty good but ads
text: Overall Outlook is a good email app. One recent change though drops the score a bit. MS has added ads. Not that big a deal, but they are supposed to only be in the free version. I have subscription to 365 and am supposed to get ad free, yet cannot get rid of them. To get another star, make the ads go away for subscription users.

title: Good cross-platform app
text: If you need seamless operations across MS and Apple ecosystems with cloud access always, this app could work for you.  I use it daily for 5 years+. You can use it easily on a basic level, or dig into the deeper layers for more power.  Great choice - no regrets.  Explore back-up system carefully if you need to preserve a record of your files - a proprietary format is the default, and files will not be accessible unless machine you are using is running Outlook.

title: Often prefer it to Gmail
text: I didn‚Äôt realize I had Gmail fatigue until I got Outlook for my business. I have so many Gmail accounts, and it‚Äôs been great to have a new perspective on email through a different email client. Love the integration with other apps like my calendar. I wish pinning worked on my phone the way it does on my laptop. On my laptop (2023 MacBook Pro), it keeps it at the top, but on my phone (iPhone 13 ProMac), it just highlights it but doesn‚Äôt keep it at the top.

title: Quick and Easy Access

title: Love Outlook, but Lately I‚Äôve been receiving Spam
text: For the most part, outlook is far superior to any other email software. I love the simplicity. What I find annoying is when I get a single email, sometimes the notifications will look like I have 2-3 emails but when I open the app it‚Äôs only one email. Resetting my email accounts didn‚Äôt fix it. Lately I‚Äôve been receiving some spam which hasn‚Äôt ever happened before. I still give Outlook a 4.5 stars. I feel safe using Outlook email as I‚Äôm confident they don‚Äôt scan my emails like Gmail does. Every hospital I‚Äôve worked at uses Outlook because it‚Äôs such a secure email software. I just wish the notifications were accurate and the spam I‚Äôve only recently been receiving over the last two weeks‚Ä¶ which hasn‚Äôt happened for 5-6 years but suddenly there‚Äôs some spam. I recommend Outlook over any other email overall I love it.
